# GET /v1/gameCenterAchievements/{id}/relationships/localizations | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/gameCenterAchievements/{id}/relationships/localizations ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterAchievements-_id_-relationships-localizations)

-  GET /v1/gameCenterAchievements/{id}/relationships/localizations 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/gameCenterAchievements/{id}/relationships/localizations

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterAchievements-_id_-relationships-localizations#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterAchievements/{id}/relationships/localizations
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterAchievements-_id_-relationships-localizations#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterAchievements-_id_-relationships-localizations#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterAchievements-_id_-relationships-localizations#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[GameCenterAchievementLocalizationsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterachievementlocalizationslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterAchievements-_id_-relationships-localizations#see-also)

### [Reading achievements localizations](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterAchievements-_id_-relationships-localizations#Reading-achievements-localizations)

[`List all localizations for an achievement`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievements-_id_-localizations)Read information about the release for specific achievement.[`Read achievement localization information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievementlocalizations-_id_)Read localized information for a specific locale for a specific achievement.[`Read the achievement localization information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievementlocalizations-_id_-gamecenterachievement)Read the achievement associated with specific localized information.[`Read the achievement ID for a localization`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievementlocalizations-_id_-relationships-gamecenterachievement)Read the achievement ID associated with specific localized information.[`Read the image for a specific achievement localization`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievementlocalizations-_id_-gamecenterachievementimage)Read the achievement image associated with specific localized information.[`GET /v1/gameCenterAchievementLocalizations/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAchievementImage`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievementlocalizations-_id_-relationships-gamecenterachievementimage)
